Expected_ROI: The expected return on investment from the new CRM system by a specific quarter, reflecting the financial benefits and improvements in patient engagement.
Implementation_Quarter: The specific quarter by which the expected ROI from the CRM system is projected to be realized.
Financial_Justification: A brief explanation of the financial rationale behind the CRM investment decisions and expected outcomes.
Projected_Benefit_Area: The specific area or aspect of the business expected to benefit from the CRM implementation, such as patient engagement or sales performance.
Date_Recorded: The date on which the ROI projection and accompanying data were recorded in the system.

Financial_Justification: Determines financial benefits of CRM investment for patient engagement improvements.
Initial investment expected to improve sales performance.
Expected enhancement in data analytics capabilities.
Anticipated growth in marketing reach and effectiveness.
Projected increase in customer support efficiency.
Higher lead generation and conversion rates expected.
Increase in patient satisfaction levels forecasted.
